mapper.insert: insert into rename (renameid, oldclientid, newclientid, renamedate, admitBuyid) values (#{renameid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oldclientid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{newclientid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{renamedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{admitbuyid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select renameid, oldclientid, newclientid, renamedate, admitBuyid from rename
